item.description:
*** Weather update 4/3/09: Lower 30% chance of rain. Winds up to 23 mph. Bring rain gear just in case and layers to keep warm, if needed. ***

A generally looping hike of moderate difficulty where we'll aim to hike 4 hours. The hike would have a fair amount of up/down on the trail. There is plenty of trail so we'll see how far we can go and explore. I figure roughly 4 - 5 miles of hiking.

Meet at the parking lot across from Quinnipiac University at 2:30 PM. The hike would start from the trailhead off of the parking lot. We would finish at about 6:30 PM and head out to eat if people feel inclined.

Approximate location/directions via MapQuest for parking lot off Mt. Carmel Rd.:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Trail Map at:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

More park information at:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

The leader on this one in Kevin S (http://hiking.meetup.... ) so please direct questions to him.

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Dark blue Dodge Grandcaravan, CT plates. Meet at hike location.
